# Playwright Testing Project

This is a Playwright end-to-end testing project configured with TypeScript support.

## Project Setup Complete

- ✅ Node.js project initialized with npm
- ✅ Playwright testing framework installed
- ✅ TypeScript configuration added
- ✅ Test directory and example tests created
- ✅ Playwright configuration file created
- ✅ NPM scripts configured for running tests

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install
npx playwright install
npm test
```

For UI mode testing: `npm run test:ui`
